title: GTA Vice City MAC [Fixed mouse] by CIA gi AS
description:
#GTA VICE CITY by CIA gi AS#


#This is a ciderport


#I have fixed mouse problem (There still is a FUCKED 360 degrees bug)


#If game starts up you will see black screen, you must hit a key


#Let me know if it works or not


#Enjoy  (please keep seeding)


!!!!!!The game works only on Intel mac's!!!!!!!!



Here are the CHEATS :P



THUGSTOOLS  	                        All ''light'' weapons

PROFESSIONALTOOLS                 	All ''medium'' weapons

NUTTERTOOLS                      	All ''heavy'' weapons

ASPIRINE 	                        Full Health

PRECIOUSPROTECTION 	                Full Armor

DEEPFRIEDMARSBARS                   	Makes Tommy fatter
